column1: The Pit Room////Amazing real Texas barbecue in the best part of town. If you find yourself in Montrose
column2: and have a craving for some amazing smoked meats
column3: get your a$$ to the Pit Room. You're not living your life right if you don't try the brisket
column5: get the beef rib.  The tacos are on point and they do the all the usual Q fixins right.  My last trip to the Pit put a hurting on me. So much amazing food that you just can't stop.  Pro tip: the leftovers make for a banging breakfast taco.
